<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit(s) to follow the given other unit or vehicle eg (without radio messages). Also is used to resume unit formation after [[doStop]], just [[doFollow]] leader even if it is the leader himself you want to resume (see Example 2). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''doFollow''' unitName2 </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] or [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> unitName2: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier1 [[doFollow]] _soldier2</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[units]] _group [[doFollow]] [[leader]] _group;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[commandFollow]], [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[setLeader]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
